name: Oh No, You Summoned the Nostalgia Monster!
name_original: Oh No, You Summoned the Nostalgia Monster!
description:
Oh No,  You Summoned the Nostalgia Monster! is a short, text-based horror comedy game about a metal monster who is very violent and wants to reminisce about your childhood. Your objective is to survive, good luck!

Made with Twine!

Twitter/Instagram: @lauraromayes
